const response = await client.security.createCrossClusterApiKey({
  name: "my-cross-cluster-api-key",
  expiration: "1d",
  access: {
    search: [
      {
        names: ["logs*"],
      },
    ],
    replication: [
      {
        names: ["archive*"],
      },
    ],
  },
  metadata: {
    description: "phase one",
    environment: {
      level: 1,
      trusted: true,
      tags: ["dev", "staging"],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
